```{r}
#Finding derivatives 
eq1<- function(x) {
  x^2 
}

# First expression 
deriv_1<- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
deriv_1

x <- 3

eval(deriv_1)
# answer = 6 

# Second expression 
deriv_2<- D(expr = expression(2*(3 * a + 2)^4 - 5), name = "a")
deriv_2

a <- 1.2

eval(deriv_2)
# answer = 4214.78
```
